title: User Interfaces & Usability
subject: Digital Technologies
description: Demonstrate understanding of human computer interaction

learningOutcomes.achieved: Demonstrate understanding of human computer interaction
learningOutcomes.merit: Demonstrate in-depth understanding of human computer interaction
learningOutcomes.excellence: Demonstrate comprehensive understanding of human computer interaction

omiList.name: Interface Purpose
omiList.description: Identify and describe the purpose of user interfaces

omiList.name: Identify Usability Principles
omiList.description: Identify usability heuristics and principles in interface designs

omiList.name: Explain Usability Principles
omiList.description: Explain how usability principles improve user experience

omiList.name: Evaluate Interface Design
omiList.description: Evaluate interface designs against usability criteria

omiList.name: Apply Design Principles
omiList.description: Apply design principles to create effective interfaces

gameSets.title: Interface Concepts
gameSets.description: Multiple choice questions assessing understanding of interface purposes and usability principles

gameSets.title: Usability Principles
gameSets.description: Match usability principles with their definitions and examples

gameSets.title: User Workflows
gameSets.description: Arrange user workflow steps in the correct sequence

gameSets.title: Usability Heuristics
gameSets.description: Complete sentences about usability heuristics and design principles

gameSets.title: Usability Principles Classification
gameSets.description: Classify UI examples into appropriate usability categories
